name: Lane Merger
description:
Press Space to move the yellow cars forward and merge safely into the road.
Press Escape to pause.
This game was made in 72 hours for ScoreSpace Jam #14!
I'm not a very good artist so huge thanks to the creators of the assets I used!!!
Sprites:
Kenny game assets - https://www.kenney.nl/assets
Keyboard keys icons by Rallix - https://opengameart.org/content/keyboard-keys-1
Leaderboard icon from icon8 - https://icons8.com/icon/7649/leaderboard
Fonts:
Alfa Slab One from Google Fonts - https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Alfa+Slab+One?category=Display
Sound effects:
Highway in the distance - https://freesound.org/people/deleted_user_7146007/sounds/383729/
Video game coin - https://freesound.org/people/harrietniamh/sounds/415083/
Crash - https://freesound.org/people/Eponn/sounds/420356/
